ODESZA Announces ‘The Last Goodbye’ Tour in Support of Their Forthcoming Album

ODESZA will be bringing their acclaimed electronic act to major cities, including a stop at the Parc Jean-Drapeau in Montreal on September 2, 2022. Get ready for a brand-new set and visuals during their biggest headlining tour thus far!

[Event Recap] ELEVATION 001: Carl Cox at the Montreal Olympic Stadium

Last Friday, we had the pleasure of attending the first large-scale indoor rave in Montreal since the beginning of the pandemic. Although the weekend may be over, the memories we made during ELEVATION 001 will live on forever. Check out what went down!

March 16, 2022

Sorel-Tracy to Host Brand-New Festival Christened ‘iO Expérience’ This Summer

A brand-new series of events christened 'iO Expérience' is scheduled to take place in Sorel-Tracy, Quebec, this summer. From June 3, 2022, through September 10, 2022, get ready to see some of your favourite artists perform!

Mark Your Calendars: 'CLOSER' Is Back at City At Night on April 15th

CLOSER is back on April 15, 2022, at City At Night! This edition has billed PAQS, DRAGOS, Stevie, and a highly-anticipated back to back by Classyfied and WAB. Don't miss it!
